name: Commit
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Commit
description:
Commit

Object yielded from commit methods to allow multiple changes to be made in a single commit.

See Gcloud::Datastore::Dataset#commit and Gcloud::Datastore::Transaction#commit.

examples.code:
gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore
datastore.commit do |c|
  c.save task1, task2
  c.delete entity1, entity2
end

gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore
datastore.commit do |c|
  c.save task1, task2
end

params.name: entities
params.description: One or more Entity objects to save.

examples.code:
gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore
datastore.commit do |c|
  c.insert task1, task2
end

params.name: entities
params.description: One or more Entity objects to insert.

examples.code:
gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore
datastore.commit do |c|
  c.update task1, task2
end

params.name: entities
params.description: One or more Entity objects to update.

examples.code:
gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore
datastore.commit do |c|
  c.delete task1, task2
end

params.name: entities_or_keys
params.description:
One or more Entity or Key
objects to remove.
